manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Television Perfect Hair Conditioner Put a smile on your face. Companion to the shampoo with the same name - Television Perfect Hair Conditioner gives you everything you need for the small screen: body, shine, strengthening, softening, and smoothing. The results – crazy good ratings. Tips/Tricks: Good for: Anyone who wants all the qualities of beautiful, healthy, camera-ready hair. Key Ingredients: Juniper Berry Extract: Helps maintain the optimal oil balance of the scalp and adds weightless moisture to the hair. Detoxifies hair follicles and soaks up impurities on the hair and scalp.Glycerin: Helps hair retain moisture by maintaining the moisture balance of hair.Babassu Seed Oil: Emollient with restorative properties. An excellent moisturizer that deep conditions dry hair and scalp. Ingredient Claims Paraben Free Sulfate Free (SLS + SLES) Petrolatum and Mineral Oil Free Cruelty Free Gluten Free Vegan *All claims verified by manufacturer

All You Need Is Good Hair R+Co is about an experience. The packaging and fragrances were designed to enhance that experience and evoke a feeling, place, style or attitude. You’ll know just by looking at a bottle or tube what a product is meant to do, and the subtle yet sophisticated fragrances—meant for both men and women—are as individual as the members of our collective.

Complete the Look Television Perfect Hair Shampoo Television Perfect Hair Shampoo gives you everything you need for the small screen: body, shine, strengthening, softening, and smoothing. High Dive Moisture + Shine Crème Plunge into deep hydration and reflective shine with High Dive . Formulated to smooth and seal the hair, it moisturizes, softens and drowns out frizz. Television Perfect Hair Masque Transform dry, styled and processed hair into camera-worthy perfection. This hair masque dramatically improves elasticity and manageability for all hair types while conditioning, deeply replenishing and fighting frizz. Trophy Shine + Texture Spray The perfect 'selfie hair spray', Trophy Shine + Texture Spray adds slight texture, dry shine, and flexible hold to hair for overall perfecting, instead of just a hairspray for hold.

Dallas Biotin Thickening Conditioner Sunset BLVD Daily Blonde Conditioner Gemstone Color Conditioner Bel Air Smoothing Conditioner + Anti-Oxidant Complex Television Perfect Hair Conditioner Atlantis Moisturizing B5 Conditioner Good for - Benefits: Improves the keratin infrastructure of hair. Increases hair strength and vitality. Makes blondes extra bright and grey fantastically silver. Preserve and prolong your shade for up to 10 washes. Smoothes the look and feel of your hair. Protects hair and scalp from free radicals and UV rays with anti-oxidant complex. Packed with minerals that revitalize dry + damaged hair. All-in one: body, shine, strength, softness, smoothness. Enriched with B5 to for intense hydration. Revitalizes dry hair, restores moisture + shine. Good for - Hair Type: Anyone with thin, fine hair looking for thickening benefits. Blonde or grey and color-treated hair. Anyone with color-treated hair. Thick, curly, frizzy-prone hair. Anyone looking for camera-ready hair. For anyone with dry, brittle and moisture-deprived hair. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my wife’s hair
reviews.reviewText: My wife’s stylist recommended this and she loves it. It’s a little pricey for the amount but works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair feels great and smells wonderful
reviews.reviewText: It doesn’t take much so the value for the money is great. The phrase there is no and it feels so moisturizing softeners and my color is amazing. I’ll continue to buy this product. Give it a try. You won’t be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS CONDITIONER!
reviews.reviewText: My hairdresser used this conditioner on my hair when I went to get my haircut. It smells fantastic! It's a little pricey but well worth it because you don't need to use that much! The best part is I can buy it on Amazon. It leaves my hair silky smooth and soft. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This conditoner is the best. I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: This conditoner is great on my hair it makes my hair smooth and thick. The best conditoner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars probably fantastic for fine hair
reviews.reviewText: if you have normal, fine hair this would be perfect for you. it smells INCREDIBLE and is super light. unfortunately it was not for me. i have fine hair but i have a LOT of it, and its very prone to dryness, so it needs a lot of extra moisture and slip for detangling. the atlantis and dallas conditioners worked a lot better for me. this pretty thin and is almost like a veil to me. i think it helps with frizz and shine but it didnt provide the moisture my hair needs personally. but i have a good feeling the fine hair girlies would love this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. It smells great and keeps my hair it tip top shape!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product ever
reviews.reviewText: I have fine straight hair and this conditioner and shampoo is the only thing I have ever found that untangled my wet hair and keeps it healthy. Randomly found this product on a trip to a family wedding in Pittsburgh, and I am on auto ship forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for fine hair
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for fine & thinning hair. Not heavy, uses very little at a time. Lasts a long time.
